entry.title: Helping tertiary students nationwide
entry.content:
The Tertiary Education Commission (TEC) initiated a piece of research on how to expand the predictive model we have previously built to more (even all) tertiary institutes in NZ.

Paper presented at AusDM 2019
entry.summary: The Tertiary Education Commission (TEC) initiated a piece of research on how to expand the predictive model we have previously built to more (even all) tertiary institutes in NZ.

entry.title: National press interview
entry.content: Algorithms are everywhere but the public sector seems scared to use them interviews me as a public servant turned corporate citizen. It was my first time being interviewed on national paper and I was worried about how the reporter would quote me out of context. It turned out she was pretty much pinpoint accurate so the article very much reflects what I see as the positive outlook of using algorithms in the public sector.
entry.summary: Algorithms are everywhere but the public sector seems scared to use them interviews me as a public servant turned corporate citizen. It was my first time being interviewed on national paper and I was worried about how the reporter would quote me out of context. It turned out she was pretty much pinpoint accurate so the article very much reflects what I see as the positive outlook of using algorithms in the public sector.
